abstract: Did you hear about the the delayed merger, rate rigging, money laundering and brokerage fraud? You'd need a scorecard to keep track of all the financial industry investigations and accusations that made headlines this week. Luckily, we've created one. A look back on our reporting of the past week's highs and lows in finance.

headline.main: Week in Review: Tracking the Investigations and Accusations
